JobFullDesc:
The North America Member Lifecycle Marketing team serves and retains members throughout their journey with Nike, starting to build the relationship at the moment they become a member, proactively nudging the member to the next best action, and intervening before they churn. This team is responsible for driving the creation and optimization of always-on triggered comms and notifications, delivering against a holistic cross-platform & omnichannel strategy and tailored to meet the needs of each individual platform.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

Nike Consumer Direct Marketing is looking for a Member Comms Manager, Retain to be a part of the NA Member Lifecycle Marketing team and play a critical role in driving the evolution of data-driven, member-centric marketing at Nike! This position will be a key component to how we engage and retain Nike members, and encourage them to take actions indicative of stronger long-term engagement and retention.
The ideal candidate should have a background in or an understanding of lifecycle marketing across multiple channels and touchpoints. The role is highly cross-functional, and will require effective communication and collaboration. The candidate will need to be able to eloquently blend art and science, with an understanding of how to interpret and action on data and an ability to develop innovative creative briefs. The candidate should understand the latest digital marketing/CRM technology in order to build comms and journeys that are feasible and take advantage of the full suite of available capabilities.

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

If this is you, you will drive the creation and optimization of always-on communications for active members, and partner with the channel owners to tailor and deploy by platform. This will include creating holistic cross-channel strategies, briefing creative & audiences, and defining a plan for continuous iteration and optimization.
A typical day/week looks like planning against new capabilities and triggers from our Global partners, making recommendations to test/learn/optimize current communications, and partnering across the org to deploy new or updated comms (emails, in-app messages, notifications).

WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

Among others, you’ll partner with Member Growth to identify business opportunities, Marketing Science to understand data and insights, and Channel Leads to execute by platform.
